Package model

Class SoccerGame

java.lang.Object
model.SoccerGame
public class SoccerGame extends Object
This class intializes and starts the game. It also manages the game and automation of the goalkeer

    • getTimeRemaining

      public Integer getTimeRemaining()
      Gets the time that is remaining.
      Returns:
      Integer that contains the amount of seconds remaining.

    • setTimeRemaining

      public void setTimeRemaining​(Integer timeRemaining)
      Sets the time for how long the game will last.
      Parameters:
      timeRemaining - is how long the game will last in seconds.

    • getGoal

      public Integer getGoal()
      Gets the amount of goals made.
      Returns:
      Integer that contains the amount of goals made.

      Sets the amount of goals.
      Parameters:
      newGoal - Integer that has the new goal value.

    • isPaused

      public Boolean isPaused()
      Gets the status of the game pause.
      Returns:
      true if the game is paused, false if not.

    • setPaused

      public void setPaused​(Boolean paused)
      Sets the isPaused status.
      Parameters:
      paused - true if the game is to be paused, false if not.

    • isOver

      public Boolean isOver()
      Gets the status of if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false if not.

    • setOver

      public void setOver​(Boolean over)
      Sets the isOver status
      Parameters:
      over - true if the game is over, false if not.

    • getGamePlayers

      public PlayerCollection getGamePlayers()
      Gets the PlayerCollection of GamePlayers
      Returns:
      PlayerCollection containing all the GamePlayers.

    • automateGoalkeeper

      public void automateGoalkeeper()
      Checks if the SoccerBall is past the Goalkeeper line and shoots it back, otherwise it moves to a random position.

    • isScored

      public boolean isScored()
      Gets the status of the ball if it is inside the goal.
      Returns:
      true if it is in the goal, false if not.

    • getActivePlayer

      public GamePlayer getActivePlayer()
      Gets the Striker GamePlayer object from the PlayerCollection instance.
      Returns:
      GamePlayer Striker object.
